documentation.description: Cancels a task, if it can be cancelled through an API.

task_id.description: Cancel the task with specified task id (node_id:task_number)

nodes.description: A comma-separated list of node IDs or names to limit the returned information; use `_local` to return information from the node you're connecting to, leave empty to get information from all nodes

actions.description: A comma-separated list of actions that should be cancelled. Leave empty to cancel all.

parent_task_id.description: Cancel tasks with specified parent task id (node_id:task_number). Set to -1 to cancel all.

wait_for_completion.description: Should the request block until the cancellation of the task and its descendant tasks is completed. Defaults to false
